wiki.content: Pink told Australia's Today Show : "It's a really fun song. I can picture everyone extremely drunk dancing late at night together. It's a very happy song, although it's angry." (Blow Me (One Last Kiss) Songfacts). User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Pink told Australia's Today Show : "It's a really fun song. I can picture everyone extremely drunk dancing late at night together. It's a very happy song, although it's angry." (Blow Me (One Last Kiss) Songfacts).
